Filer Name.Hint: Please provide your full legal name as it appears on your government-issued ID.

Annual Employment Income.Hint: Enter your total gross income earned from employment (W-2 or equivalent) in the last calendar year.

Foreign Income.Hint: If you earned any income outside your home country (e.g., foreign bank accounts, jobs abroad), list the total amount. If none, say 'none'.

Capital Gains or Losses.Hint: Report net gain or loss from the sale of stocks, real estate, or other investments. This can be a negative number if you had losses.

Did You Have Health Insurance All Year?.Hint: Answer 'yes' if you had qualifying health coverage every month last year. Otherwise, answer 'no'.

Total Itemized Deductions.Hint: If you’re not taking the standard deduction, list the total of your itemized deductions (e.g., mortgage interest, charity, state taxes).

Claiming Dependents.Hint: How many dependents are you claiming this year? Dependents include children or others you financially support.

Spouse Income (if married).Hint: If filing jointly, include your spouse’s gross income for the year. Otherwise, enter '0'.

Did You Contribute to Retirement Account.Hint: Answer 'yes' if you contributed to any IRA, 401(k), or similar retirement account during the year.

Digital Signature.Hint: Type your full name to certify the information is true to the best of your knowledge.
